I am sorry if i piss off a few Fans of this Game-Franchise, but i think that CS:GO is actualy one of the worst Counterstrike-Games out there. The Reasons: you are practicaly being forced to crouch and stand still, to aim accurately and deal at least some Damage. I dont know if this is just a Problem for me alone, but in the older Games the Aim was way more..... well, accurate when you were moving. You could still improve your Aim by just crouching and holding still, but it wasnt bloody necessary in order to kill someone. That said, the Crosshair is pretty much useless, and all i can play is deathmatch, since its the only Gamemode that allows me to have fun with this Game. If you think its a good or even great Game: good for you. But i am not one of those People.
